name: Bike Chain Bracelet
description: Handmade from original, used bike chains. This bracelet has been ridden hundreds of miles before being recycled into wearable art. Cleaned, rinsed, brushed and worked on by hand in San Francisco by Kristian Hansen. Kristian is an avid cyclist and alternative transportation advocate. He has volunteered with the Bicycle Film Festival, Transportation Alternatives and San Francisco Bicycle Coalition. He previously founded Trackstand.com, an online-directory for fixed-gear and track bike goods. In New York he worked the streets as a bike messenger.

options.name: Please measure length around wrist, so the chain can be properly cut.
